Class ViewGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Res.GUI.ViewGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ViewGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIGenerator
    Sets the contents of a window to display CalendarEntry data.
